mapper.insert: insert into rubamember (mid, mpw, mname, memail) values (#{param1},#{param2},#{param3},#{param4})
mapper.select: select count(*) from rubamember where mid=#{param1}
select count(*) from rubamember where mid=#{param1} and mpw=#{param2}
mapper.insert: insert into rubafreeboard (rfbnum, rfbname, rfbtitle, rfbcontent, rfbuserid, rfbhit, rfbreplycount) values (rfb_seq.nextval, #{param1},#{param2},#{param3},#{param4},0,0)
mapper.select: select * from rubafreeboard order by rfbnum desc
mapper.update: update rubafreeboard set rfbhit = rfbhit+1 where rfbnum=#{param1}
mapper.insert: insert into rubareply (rrnum, rrorinum, rrid, rrcontent) values (rr_seq.nextval, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3})
